titleStmt.title: Love to the life, or, Some meditations upon loving, and washing in the blood of Christ together, with a tast of gospel-promises, as the churches stock, or, believers patrimony. By R.M. the Benjamin of his Fathers house.
titleStmt.author: Mayhew, R. (Richard)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for B. Harris, at the Stationers Arms in Swithins Alley,

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
